name: Spinny The Neuron
description:
This game was created in less than 48 hours the the Melbourne Global Game Jam 2018 site. It is a prototype for an MMO, where players collaborate to complete the level, leaving thoughts for each new player.

In 'Multiplayer' mode, thoughts are automatically tweeted via @SpinnyTheNeuron.

Controls:
Arrows: move
Escape: exit to menu

Jacob Leaney - Game Design, Production, Sound/Music
Jason Tsorlinis - Programming, Game Design
Sarah Pavlich - Art
Sean Lacy - Narrative, Level Design

Special thanks to Global Game Jam, Michael Boag, and Zane Woodhead.
